subject: Not another email from Ms. Stewart:)
body:
Treat yourself and your woman to a marvelous, sensual experience.

Introducing the Vibrator Ring 

Its patented design is both comfortable and washable. The Ring section
easily stretches to fit any size and is made of non-toxic silicone rubber

The Vibrator Ring features a raised tickler with thinly sculptured ridges
especially designed to stimulate her c-spot and a micro vibration motor

It's self-powered & has a switch to turn the device on and off as you
choose. So you're in control.
